title: Brand: AcuRite / Part #: 02077M
body_html:
Item #: 67734210
Brand: AcuRite
Model #: 02077M

Product Specifications

Measures Temperature; Humidity
Wifi Capability No
Lightning Detector No
Measures Indoor Temperature Yes
Anemometer No
Measures Indoor Humidity Yes
Moon Phases Yes
Minimum Temperature (C - 2 Decimals) -40.00
Minimum Temperature (Deg F - 3 Decimals) -40.000
Maximum Temperature C 70.00
Power Source (2) AA Batteries
Maximum Temperature (F) ( - 0 Decimals) 158.000
Minimum Humidity (Percent) 0
Maximum Humidity (Percent) 99
Temperature Accuracy +/- 2 F
Humidity Accuracy +/-4% from 10-20% RH; +/-3% from 20-80% RH; +/-4% from 80-90% RH; +/-5% from 90-99% RH; +/-5% from 0-10% RH
Display Type Color LCD
Display Width (Decimal Inch) 4.884
Display Height (Decimal Inch) 3.1020
Features AcuRite Weather Station Forecaster With Color Display For Temperature, Humidity, Hyperlocal Forecast, And Built-In Barometer; Illuminated LCD Color Display: Easy-To-View Display With Adjustable Dimmer Makes For The Perfect Addition To Your Home Technology And Easy Placement Anywhere In The House Or Office; Weather Forecast And Forecasting Technology: Remote Temperature Sensor Hung Outside Provides A Hyperlocal, Personalized Weather Forecast 12 Hours From Your Current Conditions; Dynamic Forecast Icons And Time: Displays Trend Arrows And Acts As A Weather Clock, So You'll Always Know The Latest Weather Trends And Current Time; Intelli-Time Weather Clock: Automatically Adjusts For Daylight Saving Time; Real-Time Weather Conditions: Receive Readings On Your Home Weather Station For Indoor And Outdoor Temperature, Humidity, And Barometric Pressure Trends From An Outdoor Temperature Sensor
